# Phoenix Contexts & Schemas
> Guidelines for organizing business logic and data access in Phoenix applications using Context modules as API boundaries and Ecto Schemas for data definition.

## Resources
* [Phoenix Contexts Guide](https://hexdocs.pm/phoenix/contexts.html): Official guide explaining the concept and benefits of using Contexts in Phoenix.
* [Ecto Schemas Guide](https://hexdocs.pm/ecto/Ecto.Schema.html): Hexdocs for `Ecto.Schema`, used to define data structure and types.
* [Ecto Changesets Guide](https://hexdocs.pm/ecto/Ecto.Changeset.html): Hexdocs for `Ecto.Changeset`, used for data validation and casting within Context functions.
* [Ecto Associations Guide](https://hexdocs.pm/ecto/associations.html): Hexdocs covering how to define relationships between Schemas (`belongs_to`, `has_many`, etc.).
